eventParts.text: Oh no, look! Some birds are being harassed by vultures!
Oh flock off, kid! We’re in the middle of something here.
Please, help us! The vultures won’t leave us alone!
Quiet! This’ll all be so much easier if you shut your beak. It’s not like I wanna do this. Hand over the seeds!
Wait, what do you mean you don’t want to do this?
Ugh, this is taking too long, I’m outta here!
Oh no, the seeds! They’ve scattered everywhere!

eventConsequence.selectionText: We have to focus on helping these poor birds gather up their seeds again! Without them they won’t have any food.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Of course! I’ll help!

Rebecca gains +2 confidence!

eventConsequence.selectionText: We have to hunt down that vulture and find out what they’re up to! They said they didn’t want to do this, and that makes me worried.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
I hope those poor birds will be okay! I’m worried what will happen when we catch up to the vultures. 

Rebecca gains +2 caution!
